in_brief:
Dr. RM. Periakaruppan has more than 21 years of teaching experience. He has guided more than 150 MCA and M.Sc (SE) and M.Sc(TCS) Projects. 
He got a sponsored project Web Engineering Lab under the MODROBS of AICTE for 12 Lakhs during the year 2002. He visited Graz University, Austria during september 2013 and Tajen University, Taiwan during October 2013 topresent papers in international conferences. Currently, he is the department website in-charge.
